meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds found in pine trees.
meanings.sent1: The pinenes give pine trees their unique scent.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the pinenes to learn more about pine trees.
meanings.sent3: The pinenes in the forest whispered secrets to the curious hiker.
meanings.sent4: The pinenes danced in the air, creating a fragrant symphony.
meanings.sent5: The pinenes painted the forest with their aromatic colors.

meanings.definition: A type of terpene commonly used in fragrances and flavorings.
meanings.sent1: The pinenes added a delightful aroma to the perfume.
meanings.sent2: Chefs use pinenes to enhance the flavor of their dishes.
meanings.sent3: The pinenes in the air made everyone crave pine-scented desserts.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as refreshing as a breeze filled with pinenes.
meanings.sent5: The pinenes filled the room with a sweet and pleasant fragrance.
